text: Trump administration gives ICE broader powers to detain legal refugees, citing security concerns - CBS News
fullText: The Trump administration has given ICE the authority to detain refugees who entered the U.S. lawfully but don't have green cards yet, part of a bid to scrutinize the legal immigration system, according to a government memo obtained by CBS News.

text: Boeing defense headquarters to return to St. Louis after leaving the area in 2017 - STLPR

text: Nancy Guthrie disappearance: Sheriff pleads with suspect to ‘just let her go,’ insists case not cold - Fox News
